text:
It is great news for many people that the first #vaccine has been approved.
FACT - it is optional
FACT - importantly #Thalidomide was NOT a vaccine
FACT - read the evidence, not #scaremongering and #FakeNews #COVID19 #CovidVaccine #HandsFaceSpace #CommunityImmunity #InItTogether https://t.co/nlz4idZbWR https://t.co/458rJXlWnZ
